description: Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star EJ Johnson, 23, made quite the statement in a sheer ensemble while out for dinner at Craig's in West Hollywood with co-star Morgan Stewart, 27.
title: Rich Kids of Beverly Hills' EJ Johnson wears see-through ensemble over underwear
title_page: Rich Kids of Beverly Hills' EJ Johnson wears see-through ensemble over underwear | Daily Mail Online
text:
He has his own street style.
And on Wednesday, Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star EJ Johnson, 23, made quite the statement in a sheer ensemble while out for dinner at Craig's in West Hollywood with co-star Morgan Stewart, 27.
The son of basketball legend Magic Johnson, 56, often wears eccentric outfits while filming his E! reality show or simply while out on the town.
Scroll down for video
Out on the town: Rich Kids of Beverly Hills star EJ Johnson, 23, made quite the statement in sheer ensemble while out in West Hollywood. He was joined by co-star Morgan Stewart
EJ paired a sheer top with matching bell bottom trousers, complete with small pleats, over pair of high-waisted underpants. .
The fashion forward reality star finished off the look with a black blazer and a Hermes Birkin bag, which is said to be worth around $100,000 .
Bold: EJ paired a sheer top with matching bell bottom trousers
Since 2014, EJ has been one of the main cast members of the E! reality series, Rich Kids of Beverly Hills.
The show follows wealthy spawns of millionaires and billionaires in the 90210 area code including Dorothy Wang, 27, Morgan Stewart, 28, fiance Brendan Fitzpatrick, 27, and Jonny Drubel, 28.
The
In November 2015, Variety announced that the show had been renewed for a fourth season, featuring eight episodes.
Styling it out: The reality star's black underwear was on show
The latest will widely follow the wedding prep of Morgan and Brendan, who became engaged in March of last year.
Additional story lines will highlight Dorothy's dating life, and Jonny's attempts at becoming a successful DJ.
As for EJ, who lost 180 pounds from gastric bypass surgery, the show will follow his venture into achieving work as a model and an actor.
